segments.text: How would you describe your relationship with our boss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a fairly good working relationship , but there was also a rough spot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think his strengths are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , he has an amazing ability to analyze information and he is very good at making the right decision in tough situations .
segments.speaker: S2
